content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this little teddy is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70586ad published in knit 1 skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 2 colors 1 ball each *shown in chocolate & taupe* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing bear s ears arms and legs are worked in continuous rounds nose is embroidered
